con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:updateDirectDebitParameters> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <directDebitParameters> <multibrandIds> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <multibrandId> <!--type: int--> <brandId>3</brandId> <!--type: int--> <tenantId>3</tenantId> </multibrandId> </multibrandIds> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <directDebitIntParameter> <!--anonymous type - enumeration: [ON_DEMAND_TOPUP_LIMIT,LOW_BALANCE_THRESHOLD_TOPUP_LIMIT]--> <name>LOW_BALANCE_THRESHOLD_TOPUP_LIMIT</name> <!--type: int--> <value>3</value> </directDebitIntParameter> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <directDebitMonetaryParameter> <!--anonymous type - enumeration: [GENERAL_DAILY_MAX_AMOUNT,GENERAL_MONTHLY_MAX_AMOUNT,FEE_FREED_CLAWBACK_AMOUNT,MONTHLY_UNLIMITED_AMOUNT]--> <name>GENERAL_DAILY_MAX_AMOUNT</name> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <!--type: amount--> <value>3</value> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: currency - enumeration: [EUR]--> <currency>EUR</currency> <UNLIMITED/> </directDebitMonetaryParameter> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <chargeBackParameter> <!--anonymous type - enumeration: [CHARGE_BACK_INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE,CHARGE_BACK_MANDATE_REVOKED,CHARGE_BACK_AMBIGUOUS_BANK_DATA,CHARGE_BACK_OBJECTION,CHARGE_BACK_OTHER]--> <name>CHARGE_BACK_OBJECTION</name> <!--Optional:--> <SEPAReasonCodes> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <!--type: SEPAReasonCode--> <SEPAReasonCode>quae</SEPAReasonCode> </SEPAReasonCodes> <!--type: amount--> <fee>3</fee> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: currency - enumeration: [EUR]--> <currency>EUR</currency> </chargeBackParameter> <directDebitThresholdList> <!--0 to 5 repetitions:--> <thresholdValue> <!--type: amount--> <value>3</value> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: currency - enumeration: [EUR]--> <currency>EUR</currency> </thresholdValue> </directDebitThresholdList> <!--anonymous type - enumeration: [MONTHLY_FLEX_START_30_DAYS,MONTHLY_FIX_START_1]--> <monthlyValidationCycle>MONTHLY_FIX_START_1</monthlyValidationCycle> </directDebitParameters> </cus:updateDirectDebitParameters> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
